text: denʹ prybude koly Vin sklykaye usikh (ta kazhe): "O vy jinns, vy zayavyly bezlich humans." Yikhni lyudsʹki kompanyony skazhutʹ, "Nash Lord, my otrymaly nasolodu vid kozhnoyi kompaniyi inshykh' do my vytratyly zhyttya promizhok Vy vstanovyly dlya nas." Vin skazhe, "Peklo ye vasha dolya." Vony perebuyutʹ tam zavzhdy, z·hidno z BOZHYM budutʹ. Vash Lord ye Mudryy, Omniscient
